name: Pohen hill camp
address: Br Batusesa, Candikuning, Kec. Baturiti, Kabupaten Tabanan, Bali 82191, Indonesia
review 1:
Spent a night at Pohen Hills with my family and it was the best! The rooms was spacious, pillows are super soft, the best view from our rooms (VIP). However, minus are the bathroom area not cleaned enough as we saw insects, spider web on the chair inside the room, hair dryer not functioned well and somehow the Wi-Fi connection in the room was unstable, even the telephone in the room was not working (I did informed the staff about that, but they said it works while in fact it wasnâ€™t as I tried to call the front deskmultiple times).
Overall, it was a a memorable stay as the view was amazing. Couldnâ€™t wait to comeback!!!ðŸ¤—ðŸ¤—

name: The Blooms Villas
address: The Blooms Garden, Banjar, Batusesa, Candikuning, Bedugul, Kabupaten Tabanan, Bali 82191, Indonesia
review 1:
I stayed there for 3 days and everything was great. The panoramic, breakfast, the staff are so friendly, and the room is so neat eventho it's quite small, but it's okay since we're a couple.
The minus are, there's no WiFi there, they said that they will fix it in the 1st day I stayed, but until I checkout, the WiFi still not fixed. I ordered a dinner there but it was tasteless, maybe you need to improve for your dinner menu because your breakfast is great. Even I just order the basic menu; corn soup, fuyung hai, and nasi goreng, but they're all tasteless.
review 2:
You got everything here!
Food Very good
Staff so friendly
Wow views! Stunning surrounding but it opens for public!
Weird noise during the night, may be wild animal!

All good thanks
review 3: It is difficult to call the contact number, no one answer the call meanwhile we want to collect the facilities of the property.
review 4: Beautiful 6 villas inside the blooms garden
